name: Prime Time (Leowski)
description:
Recommended to play in Full Screen. 

A two-man demo project for a Metroidvania-style action platformer. The game has an emphasis on time-traveling mechanics once you gain an ability. We explored various possibilities of time-traveling puzzles, platforming, and combat. Unfortunately, the demo is a bit unfinished and will receive updates towards a finished version as time goes on.  

The project also had a focus on adaptive music.
